name: Sea To Shining Sea Quiz | Physical Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text: The Suez Canal joins the Mediterranean with what sea?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	It was completed in 1869 and separates Africa from Asia.

questions.text: Name the sea that separates Siberia from Alaska.
questions.explanation:
Bering.

	It separates Asia and North America(Alaska).

questions.text: What sea is north of Turkey?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	It is also bordered by Ukraine to the north, Russia to the northeast, Georgia to the east, and Bulgaria and Romania to the west.

questions.text: What river empties into the Caspian Sea at Astrakhan?
questions.explanation:
Volga.

	It is the principal waterway of western Russia.

questions.text: What is the name of the sea between Greece and Turkey?
questions.explanation:
Aegean.

	It is an arm of the Mediterranean Sea.

questions.text: What was the name of the nation surrounding the Aral Sea in the 1950's?
questions.explanation:
U.S.S.R.

	The Aral was once considered a large saltwater lake.The U.S.S.R as we knew does no longer exist. It is now surrounded by two former Soviet Republic Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan.

questions.text: In which sea would you find the Great Barrier Reef?
What is the name of the sea between Sweden and Poland?
questions.explanation:
Baltic.

	Actually encircled by ten countries. (Norway, Sweden, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Russia, Poland, Germany and Denmark).

questions.text: Barents, Kara, East Siberian, Chukchi and Beaufort Seas lie in what ocean?
What sea joins the Mediterranean Strait of Otranto behind the heel of Italy's boot?
questions.explanation:
Adriatic.

	It is actually an arm of the Mediterranean Sea.
